name: Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell

Rulings.Edison:
●Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell only negates the activation of Spell Cards. It does not prevent the use of Continuous Spell Cards already active, like Archfiend's Oath.
●If you activate a Spell Card and chain Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell, then your opponent can't activate Spell Cards of the same name, even though your opponent didn't activate the Spell Card in the first place.
●When you negate and destroy Black Pendant with Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell, and afterwards a Set Black Pendant is destroyed, the effect of Black Pendant won't be activated (neither the Black Pendant that was negated nor the Set Black Pendant destroyed later will inflict 500 damage).
Rulings.Tengu:
●Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell only negates the activation of Spell Cards. It does not prevent the use of Continuous Spell Cards already active, like Archfiend's Oath.
●If you activate a Spell Card and chain Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell, then your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards of the same name, even though your opponent didn't activate the Spell Card in the first place.
●When you negate and destroy Black Pendant with Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell, and afterwards a Set Black Pendant is destroyed, the effect of Black Pendant will not be activated (neither the Black Pendant that was negated nor the Set Black Pendant destroyed later will inflict 500 damage).
Rulings.Goat:
●Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell only negates the activation of Spell Cards. It does not prevent the use of Continuous Spell Cards already applying, like Archfiend's Oath.
●If you activate a Spell Card and chain Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell, then your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards of the same name, even though your opponent didn't activate the Spell Card in the first place.
●When you negate and destroy Black Pendant with Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell, and afterwards a Set Black Pendant is destroyed, the effect of Black Pendant will not be activated (neither the Black Pendant that was negated nor the Set Black Pendant destroyed later will inflict 500 damage).
●If “Fiber Jar’s” Flip effect has successfully resolved, Spell Cards affected by “Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell” are still not allowed to be activated for the remainder of the duel.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell" only negates the activation of Spell Cards. It does not prevent the use of Continuous Spell Cards already active, like "Archfiend's Oath".\n2. If you activate a Spell Card and chain "Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell", then your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards of the same name, even though your opponent didn't activate the Spell Card in the first place.\n3. When you negate and destroy "Black Pendant" with "Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell", and afterwards a Set "Black Pendant" is destroyed, the effect of "Black Pendant" will not be activated (neither the "Black Pendant" that was negated nor the Set "Black Pendant" destroyed later will inflict 500 damage).

PSCT.Base: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 Spell; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, and if you do that, your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards with that name for the rest of this Duel.
